step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Photo > Sunny Afternoon.=Choose Effects > Photo > Sunny Afternoon.
$$$/Tutorial/Change the intensity to about 50% and tap Apply.=Change the intensity to about 50% and tap Apply.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.=To enter the percentage by number instead of using the slider, tap the value field to open the keypad editor.

step.text: $$$/Tutorial/Choose Effects > Photo > Old Sepia.=Choose Effects > Photo > Old Sepia.
$$$/Tutorial/Change Saturation to about 80% and Intensity to about 90%. Tap Apply.=Change Saturation to about 80% and Intensity to about 90%. Tap Apply.
$$$/Tutorial/Drag the center point of the upper slider to the right to lighten the midtones. Tap Apply.=Drag the center point of the upper slider to the right to lighten the midtones. Tap Apply.
step.tiptext: $$$/Tutorial/Use Levels to adjust the shadows, midtones, and highlights. Drag the left point on the slider to adjust the shadows. Drag the right point of the slider to adjust the highlights. Dragging the center point on the slider will adjust the midtones.=Use Levels to adjust the shadows, midtones, and highlights. Drag the left point on the slider to adjust the shadows. Drag the right point of the slider to adjust the highlights. Dragging the center point on the slider will adjust the midtones.
